data.lyric:
[ti:off the table]
[ar:Ariana Grande/The Weeknd]
[al:Positions]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]off the table - Ariana Grande (爱莉安娜·格兰德)/The Weeknd
[00:05.45]Lyrics by：Tommy Brown/Travis Sayles/Ariana Grande/Abel Tesfaye/Steven Franks/Shintaro Yasuda
[00:10.91]Composed by：Tommy Brown/Travis Sayles/Ariana Grande/Abel Tesfaye/Steven Franks/Shintaro Yasuda
[00:16.37]Ariana Grande：
[00:18.84]Will I ever love the same way again
[00:22.24]Way again
[00:23.45]Will I ever love somebody like the way I did you
[00:28.81]Never thought you'd be so d**n hard to replace
[00:33.34]I swear I don't mean to be this way
[00:35.82]If I can't have you is love completely off the table
[00:40.67]Do I sit this one out and wait for the next life
[00:44.25]Next life
[00:45.44]Am I too cold
[00:46.41]Am I not nice
[00:49.65]Might not be quite yet healed or ready
[00:52.58]Should I be goin' too steady
[00:54.20]Too steady
[00:54.72]But I just wanna know is love completely off the table
[00:58.60]Ariana Grande：
[00:59.78]Will you bе there
[01:00.93]Will you be there
[01:04.42]Can I still love you
[01:07.20]Can I can I babe
[01:09.15]Not yet healed or ready
[01:10.79]Not ready
[01:11.65]Shouldn't be goin' too steady
[01:13.14]Too steady
[01:14.03]Just wanna know is love completely off the table
[01:17.57]The Weeknd/Ariana Grande：
[01:18.52]I'll wait for you
[01:21.09]Even though it always feels like I'll be number two
[01:25.46]To someone you can't hold anymore
[01:30.23]If you let me in I'm ready to give you what I couldn't before
[01:34.75]'Cause I got you girl let me help you through it
[01:39.95]You're trying to fill the void with a couple boys
[01:42.40]I can see right through it
[01:43.57]You can see right through it
[01:44.58]I can you love you harder than I did before
[01:49.17]Was in a dark place back then
[01:51.62]I was toxic then I was toxic to someone else
[01:56.37]I was haunted by the hills
[01:58.87]Oh yeah yeah
[02:01.10]I couldn't give you my all but I will
[02:05.91]If you let me in your arms
[02:07.77]Your arms
[02:08.30]If you let me in your heart
[02:10.63]I don't think that love's completely off the table
[02:15.11]Ariana Grande/The Weeknd：
[02:15.87]Will you be there
[02:17.58]Yes I will be there for you
[02:20.46]Can I still love you
[02:25.06]Not yet healed or ready
[02:26.71]Not ready
[02:27.57]Shouldn't be goin' too steady
[02:29.06]Too steady no no
[02:30.03]Just wanna know is love completely off the table
[02:32.63]Ariana Grande/The Weeknd：
[02:33.19]So can you hold me
[02:35.26]If I let you can you prove it to me
[02:38.34]Oh no-no no
[02:39.63]'Cause I need you to calm me down babe
[02:44.22]Gotta get out of my head
[02:45.74]Oh woah
[02:46.58]Tryna be healed from this pain
[02:48.04]Oh
[02:49.03]Just wanna know just wanna know can you baby
[02:51.69]Hey
[02:51.95]Can you touch it like you believe in it baby
[02:55.51]Oh hey
[02:56.16]Do you think you never gonna leave on me baby
[03:00.63]'Cause I ain't her and you ain't him thankfully
[03:03.73]Baby don't leave
[03:05.28]But it's gon' be hard to let someone else in again
[03:09.23]Woah
[03:09.92]Baby baby
[03:11.62]Woo-hoo
[03:13.00]Will you be there
[03:14.22]Will you be there
[03:16.24]I'll still wait
[03:17.28]Can I still love you
[03:18.25]I'll still wait for you babe oh no-no no can I still love you
[03:22.29]Not yet healed or ready
[03:23.75]Ooh not ready
[03:24.70]Shouldn't be goin' too steady
[03:26.04]No no ooh
[03:27.08]Just wanna know is love completely off the table baby
[03:30.98]The Weeknd：
[03:31.51]I swear I swear
[03:36.04]I will wait for you whenever you need
[03:41.11]Ooh ooh
data.trans:
[ti:off the table]
[ar:Ariana Grande/The Weeknd]
[al:Positions]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.45]//
[00:10.91]//
[00:16.37]//
[00:18.84]我还会这样爱一个人吗
[00:22.24]还会吗
[00:23.45]我还会像爱你一样爱别人吗
[00:28.81]没想到如此难以找到替代你的人
[00:33.34]我发誓 我不想变成这样
[00:35.82]如果我不能拥有你 是不是爱情就只能免谈了
[00:40.67]我是不是就得坐以待毙 等待下辈子了
[00:44.25]下辈子
[00:45.44]我太冷酷了吗
[00:46.41]我不好吗
[00:49.65]可能伤口还没愈合 也还没准备好
[00:52.58]我应该这样谨小慎微吗
[00:54.20]太谨小慎微
[00:54.72]但我只想知道 是不是爱情彻底没希望了
[00:58.60]//
[00:59.78]你会不会来到我身边
[01:00.93]你会不会来到我身边
[01:04.42]我还能不能爱你
[01:07.20]还能不能 宝贝
[01:09.15]伤口还没愈合 也还没准备好
[01:10.79]没准备好
[01:11.65]不该如此谨小慎微
[01:13.14]太谨小慎微
[01:14.03]只想知道 是不是爱情已经没有希望
[01:17.57]//
[01:18.52]我会等你
[01:21.09]即使总感觉我只是你的第二选择
[01:25.46]你最想要的还是那个已经失去的人
[01:30.23]如果你让我走进你的心里 我会给你以前我给不起的东西
[01:34.75]因为你有我呢 姑娘 让我帮你度过这段时光
[01:39.95]你和别的男孩一起玩 只想填补内心的空虚
[01:42.40]我一眼就能看明白
[01:43.57]你一眼就能看明白
[01:44.58]我可以比从前更加爱你
[01:49.17]曾经我也活在黑暗中
[01:51.62]那时我很坏 我对别人也很差
[01:56.37]过去的事情让我痛苦不堪
[01:58.87]//
[02:01.10]我不能把什么都给你 但我会尽量
[02:05.91]如果你让我躺在你的怀里
[02:07.77]你的怀抱
[02:08.30]如果你让我住进你的心里
[02:10.63]我觉得爱情并不是完全没有希望
[02:15.11]//
[02:15.87]你会不会来到我身边
[02:17.58]我会来到你身边
[02:20.46]我还能不能爱你
[02:25.06]伤口还没愈合 也还没准备好
[02:26.71]没准备好
[02:27.57]不该如此谨小慎微
[02:29.06]太谨小慎微
[02:30.03]只想知道 是不是爱情已经没有希望
[02:32.63]//
[02:33.19]所以你能否抱住我
[02:35.26]如果我答应你 你能否证明你的真心
[02:38.34]//
[02:39.63]因为我需要你来平息我不安的心 宝贝
[02:44.22]我必须抛开那些胡思乱想
[02:45.74]//
[02:46.58]努力从过去的伤痛中走出来
[02:48.04]//
[02:49.03]只想知道 你能不能做到 宝贝
[02:51.69]//
[02:51.95]你是否有信心触动我的心 宝贝
[02:55.51]//
[02:56.16]你是不是觉得你永远不会离弃我 宝贝
[03:00.63]因为我不是她 你也不是他 幸亏如此
[03:03.73]宝贝 不要离去
[03:05.28]但是要重新敞开怀抱容纳别人 也不是很容易
[03:09.23]//
[03:09.92]宝贝
[03:11.62]//
[03:13.00]你会不会来到我身边
[03:14.22]你会不会来到我身边
[03:16.24]我依然会等待
[03:17.28]我还能不能爱你
[03:18.25]我依然会等待你 我还能不能爱你
[03:22.29]伤口还没愈合 也还没准备好
[03:23.75]没准备好
[03:24.70]不该如此谨小慎微
[03:26.04]//
[03:27.08]只想知道 是不是爱情已经没有希望 宝贝
[03:30.98]//
[03:31.51]我发誓
[03:36.04]我会等你 随时恭候你
[03:41.11]//
